title: 103_hr1228
content: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to revise provisions determining the effectively connected net investment income of foreign companies carrying on insurance business in the United States. Requires such companies to recompute their effectively connected net investment income for taxable years beginning after December 31, 1997. Provides for increases in such income where the recomputed amount exceeds the income for the recomputed year. Requires payment of interest on the underpayment of adjusted amounts.
